name: Buddy (itch) (surr_sloidah)
description:
Buddy is a short point and click horror game in which the player awakens in a bizarre room with a large computer AI hooked up in front of them, the player has to figure out how to escape the room as well as unlock each of the 8 endings the game has, while having to deal with the AI's often annoying demeanour.

This is a short game (it will likely take 30 minutes to an hour) and has been mainly designed by me to try out new game ideas, if you have any suggestions for improvements or any bugs for me to fix, please feel free to drop me an email at leif.unity3dbusiness@gmail.com

If you are emailing me about bugs, if you can, please provide a video of you reproducing the bug or give me a list of steps to follow so I can reproduce and hopefully fix it.

Thank you!
